Name: Melter Man
About the game: MELT STUFF! SUCK STUFF UP! MAKE NEW STUFF WITH THE STUFF YOU VACUUMED UP! DO OTHER COOL STUFF. The Toys have taken over! MELT their cute little faces, VACUUM them up, and SHOOT them out to rebuild the environment and SAVE the Toy Factory.
